title: Daily Morning Puja
description: A comprehensive morning worship routine to start your day with divine blessings.

steps.title: Preparation
steps.description: Take a bath and wear clean clothes. Clean the puja space thoroughly.

steps.title: Lighting the Lamp
steps.description: Light the diya with ghee while chanting 'Om Jai Jagdish Hare'.

steps.title: Water Offering
steps.description: Fill the kalash with clean water and offer to the deity.

steps.title: Flower Offering
steps.description: Offer fresh flowers while chanting the deity's mantra.

steps.title: Incense and Camphor
steps.description: Light incense sticks and camphor, moving them in circular motion.

steps.title: Food Offering (Naivedya)
steps.description: Offer fruits and sweets to the deity.

steps.title: Aarti
steps.description: Perform aarti with the diya and sing devotional songs.

steps.title: Prayers
steps.description: Sit quietly and offer your prayers and gratitude.

title: Ganesh Chaturthi Puja
description: Special worship for Lord Ganesha on Ganesh Chaturthi to remove obstacles and bring prosperity.

steps.title: Idol Installation
steps.description: Place Ganesh idol on a clean platform covered with red cloth. Face it towards north or east.

steps.title: Invocation (Avahan)
steps.description: Invoke Lord Ganesha with mantras and prayers.

steps.title: Panchamrit Abhishek
steps.description: Bathe the idol with mixture of milk, curd, honey, ghee, and sugar.

steps.title: Vastra (Cloth Offering)
steps.description: Offer red cloth and sacred thread.

steps.title: Shodashopachara
steps.description: Perform 16 traditional offerings including flowers, incense, lamp, and food.

steps.title: Durva and Modak Offering
steps.description: Offer 21 durva grass blades and 21 modaks with devotion.

steps.title: Ganesh Aarti
steps.description: Perform aarti with camphor and sing 'Sukh Karta Dukh Harta'.

steps.title: Prasad Distribution
steps.description: Distribute modaks and other offerings as prasad.

title: Shiva Abhishek
description: Sacred bathing ritual of Shiva Lingam for peace, prosperity, and spiritual growth.

steps.title: Preparation
steps.description: Clean the Shiva Lingam and the worship area. Sit facing east.

steps.title: Milk Abhishek
steps.description: Pour milk over the lingam while chanting 'Om Namah Shivaya'.

steps.title: Yogurt Abhishek
steps.description: Pour yogurt as the second offering.

steps.title: Honey Abhishek
steps.description: Pour honey slowly over the lingam.

steps.title: Ghee and Sugar
steps.description: Offer ghee and sugar water in sequence.

steps.title: Water Abhishek
steps.description: Pour clean water or Gangajal to cleanse the lingam.

steps.title: Bel Patra Offering
steps.description: Offer bel leaves (in sets of 3) while chanting mantras.

steps.title: Aarti and Prayers
steps.description: Perform aarti and recite Shiva mantras or Rudram.
